text: Jake was grilled was Boston bombing survivor Jeff Bauman ( Picture : Facebook ) Some of Taylor Swift ’ s best songs are about Jake Gyllenhaal ( don ’ t argue with me ) and in particular All Too Well, in which she sang about their three months together during the autumn of 2010. Now, seven years after they split, Gyllenhaal has revealed that he is keeping tabs on his ex and finally answered a question about their time together. The 36 - year - old actor was speaking during a Facebook Live with Jeff Bauman, a young man who lost his legs at the Boston marathon bombing in 2013 and whom Gyllenhaal played in his new movie Stronger about the events on that April afternoon.
